## Hints.TechniqueIds variable

Standard technique identifiers for built-in solving techniques.

**Signature:**

```typescript
TechniqueIds: {
    readonly NAKED_SINGLES: TechniqueId;
    readonly HIDDEN_SINGLES: TechniqueId;
}
```
